it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.tripManager

Class TripManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.UserManager
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.tripManager.TripManager

  • public class TripManager
extends UserManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle trips - arranging functionalities

      • selectTicket

        public void selectTicket(long ticketId,
                         long travelComponentId)
                  throws EntityNotFoundException,
                         IncompatibleTravelMeansException,
                         TicketNotValidException
        Mark a ticket as to-be-used in a specific travel
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be selected
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travel the ticket is to be connected with
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if either the ticket or the travel specified does not exist
        IncompatibleTravelMeansException - if the ticket is incompatible with the specified travel
        TicketNotValidException - if the ticket can't be linked to the given travel component ( why is explained inside the exception instance )

      • deselectTicket

        public void deselectTicket(long ticketId,
                           long travelComponentId)
                    throws EntityNotFoundException
        Deselect a ticket, previously marked as to-be-used in a specific travel
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be deselected
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travel the ticket is to be connected with
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if either the ticket or the travel specified does not exist

      • checkTicketConsistency

        Checks the consistency of the fields that are shared by all ticket messages ( common super class )
        Parameters:
        addTicketMessage - generic ticket message to be checked
        Returns:
        a list of wrong fields, if any, or an empty list otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of wrong fields, if any, or an empty list otherwise

      • checkErrorExistence

        private void checkErrorExistence(java.util.List<java.lang.String> errors)
                          throws InvalidFieldException
        Checks that an array of errors description is empty or not
        Parameters:
        errors - list that might contains all possible errors
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if the list actually contains one or more errors, which one is specified inside the exception thrown

      • modifyDistanceTicket

        public DistanceTicket modifyDistanceTicket(AddDistanceTicketMessage distanceTicketMessage,
                                           long ticketId)
                                    throws InvalidFieldException,
                                           EntityNotFoundException,
                                           IncompatibleTravelMeansException
        Modifies a distance ticket that is already present in the user's profile
        Parameters:
        distanceTicketMessage - message representing the info that are to be updated
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket that is to be updated
        Returns:
        the updated distance ticket instance
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields are wrong ( which one is specified in the error class )
        EntityNotFoundException - if the ticket to-be-modified does not exist
        IncompatibleTravelMeansException - if after the update one or more public travel means would become incompatible

      • addLinkedTravels

        private void addLinkedTravels(java.util.List<TravelComponent> linkedTravels,
                              Ticket ticket)
                       throws IncompatibleTravelMeansException
        Connects a list of travels with a ticket that is to be modified, revert all changes if the ticket becomes incompatible with his previously connected travels
        Parameters:
        linkedTravels - travels to be linked to the ticket
        ticket - ticket that is to be connected with the list of travels
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTravelMeansException - if the ticket would become incompatible with his previously connected travels
